name: Naraka Bladepoint
description: NARAKA: BLADEPOINT offers close-range action set on the mysterious Eastern region called Morus. The game features a boundless movement system that allows players to climb, hang, and even parkour. With an aim-at-whatever-you-want grappling hook and a sophisticated yet beginner-friendly combat system involving accessible block & parry mechanics, NARAKA: BLADEPOINT is designed to provide a brand-new experience of melee combat and world exploration. Integrating Eastern aesthetics and philosophy, NARAKA: BLADEPOINT presents a forsaken realm of splendid landscapes as well as inexplicable enigmas.
